CustomField.description: This specifies which fields to display based on page layout. If none is selected you must specify the specific fields to display in the Fields selection Full - The full layout corresponds to the fields on the record detail page. Compact - The compact layout corresponds to the fields on the highlights panel at the top of the record.

CustomField.label: Page Layout
